phrases: What is the matter?
You cannot stand?
Fist of Flowing Water, Crushed Rock
Charanko, what have you been doing here the last six months?
Did not I tell you that if you were going to become my student,
you needed to train like your life depended on it?
You will not be able to learn any techniques.
You are not fit to be a martial artist.
I am expelling you from this dojo as of today.
Do not ever come back again.
Bang is acting strange?
The Hunt Begins
He suddenly said we were going to do a lesson, then beat the crap out of me.
I cannot believe someone as kind as Master Bang would do this.
There has to be a reason.
I came here because I thought you guys might know something.
I have no idea.
Bang?
You mean the Class S Silverfang?
Once you are done talking, let us continue our game.
There seem to be more of you here now...
I can at least guess what is going on.
I am assuming that Garo is somehow involved.
Garo?!
You mean the guy who was expelled from our dojo?
Why him?
What?
You have not heard?
Bang's former disciple, Garo,
has been classified as an evil monster and is wanted by the Hero Association.
Bang said he would bring him down himself.
Monster?
Garo?
Apparently, there was an incident at the Hero Association HQ.
The Association's trying to hide it,
but if there is an intense battle, bystanders are sure to get hurt.
That is probably why Bang wanted to distance you from it all.
I see...
Master Bang, am I just holding you back?
What do you think about Bang's actions, Master Saitama?
It is not like I am that close with that old man.
Silverfang, huh?
That is such a good hero name.
Silverfang
Bald Cape
What the hell is Bald Cape even supposed to mean?
There is one thing that is bothering me.
Who are you?
Master, he is some small fry named Charanko.
He is Bang's current number one student.
We have met him before.
Huh?
Have we?
I cannot keep holding him back forever.
I need to take care of Garo for Master Bang.
But I guess there is no way I will find him that easily.
Even if I happen to find Garo, I
Hey, you.
You are a hero, are not you?
I am indeed.
My name is Mumen Rider.
Class C Rank 1 Mumen Rider
I am going to hunt you.
What do you mean by hunt?
You do not seem like a fan of mine.
Help me become a true monster.
Found you!
You sure that is him?
It sure is.
Hey!
I came to repay you for the other da
You came to get revenge, Tank-Top Vegetarian?
Well, are not you an adorable fool, coming here to throw away the life you
were given a second chance at?
I will kill the rest of your musclehead buddies, too.
Die!
What?
I heard you gave my bro a hard time.
Class S Rank 16 Tank-Top Master
A Class S?!
I have caught a big one!
This is great!
I am getting all fired up!
Tank-Top Tackle!
There it is!
Master's Tank-Top Tackle!
He is taken down countless monsters with that move!
Way to go, Master!
Now that bastard
Bro, he did not go down!
All right, Little Bro. Prepare to run!
Is he really...
human?
Fist of Flowing Water, Crushed Rock
Is everything ready?
I am an old man with no family.
Just like you.
Master of the Fist of Whirling Wind, Slashing Steel
You cannot be serious.
I have said goodbye to several hundred pupils.
You dropped everything to help out your precious little brother.
You are so cool, Big Brother.
If we left Garo alone, he would eventually come for my dojo, as well.
All right, let us go!
Be careful, Big Brother.
I cannot even imagine how powerful he is now,
Considering you took the time to summon me...
There is another one!
Tank-Top Punch!
I freaked out for a second when he stood up after Master's tackle, but...
This will probably be over soon.
He is human.
There is no doubt about that.
Still, I wonder why...
I feel like I need to make him disappear here and now.
Sorry, but this is the end.
Hold it right there!
Mumen Rider!
Are not you ashamed of yourself?!
You are a Class S hero, and you are trying to finish off a human?!
This fight is over!
It is his fault for picking a fight with a hero!
Get out of the way!
We are going to show this guy how terrifying we are!
All of you, stop.
He is right.
I did not start wearing a tank-top just so I could fight with humans.
Hey, you.
If you have learned your lesson, swear that you will never hurt anyone ever again.
Fine...
I am going home.
Sorry for losing control.
As if.
I am still going to murder all of you!
Yeah.
I figured as much.
I will take care of you, here and now.
Whoops.
Guess I used it.
I wanted to avoid it since it reminds me of the old man, but whatever.
Fist of Flowing Water, Crushed Rock
He...
He was hiding his true abilities!
Oh, what is this?
A mighty Class S hero is on his knees?
Do not underestimate me.
You just took me by surprise, that is all.
You can just sit there and watch
as the Monster Garo finishes off every last member of your crew.
Garo?!
You are Garo, the human calling himself a monster?!
W-Wait!
Do not touch them!
Justice Crash!
Well?
Come at me.
Garo!
I know your fighting style now.
I am done with you, Tank-Top Master.
Now, then...
I guess I would better clean up the rest of you.
You bastard!
You really think you can beat our numbers?!
Why, you
You are finished, Garo!
You have brought shame upon our dojo!
Take this!
Fist of Flowing Water, Crushed Rock!
This is awful.
Looks like we were a little too late.
Bang, can you predict where he might show up next?
Bang?
Charanko...
I heard that Tank-Top Master got taken out by the hero hunter.
You cannot be serious.
Even a Class S could not defeat him?
Apparently, his followers and Mumen Rider, who were also there, got beat up, too.
So the guy's going after any hero?
It does not even matter if they are Class A or C?
Give me a break...
Quit freaking out, guys.
Let us just catch this hero hunter ourselves!
How?
The guy took out a Class S!
You idiots.
He is not some scary monster.
He is just a human.
But I heard that he is a former student of Silverfang's.
I know some martial arts, too.
If a guy punches like this, you do this.
If he punches like this, you go like, bam!
And if he goes like this, you do... this!
There he is.
Hero Association Hospital
I am glad you came to visit me, Saitama.
Sure.
Can I put the bananas here?
Yeah, thanks.
Of course you are eating them...
It was all over the Hero Association newspaper.
A single monster took out dozens of heroes.
Glad to see you made it out alive.
Here, have a banana.
He was a human.
Huh?
A human calling himself a monster.
But he is strong.
He is a terrifyingly strong human.
Who was stronger, the fish monster or him?
Hmm...
The Deep Sea King was pretty insane, but there is something different this time.
His techniques.
He is an expert martial artist.
It appears that Silverfang raised one nasty monster.
This dude just jumped into our conversation.
Do you have any idea who he is?
You know.
He is the Class S hero, Tank-Top Master.
Oh, yeah.
You were in the paper, too.
It said you got your ass beat the worst.
Cannot you just say I stood my ground the most?!
Damn!
To think I would let such a kid get the better of me...
Martial arts can be such a pain in the ass.
Martial arts?
Here, have a banana.
Oh...
Thanks.
Now, could you tell me more about this guy?
Zombieman
King
Hey, kid.
Looks like you are reading something interesting.
This guy's the Class S hero, King.
He is the strongest one of all.
This is the Class A hero, Lightning Genji.
He is always patrolling my neighborhood.
Lightning Genji
Look!
I even got his autograph!
His autograph, eh?
I would love his autograph, too.
Could you introduce me sometime?
Sure!
You must like heroes, too, old dude.
Hero Guide
That Hero Guide looks neat.
Say, could I borrow that, just for a week?
What?
No way.
Get your own.
Jeez, you are so stingy.
Hey, what the heck?
They even have monsters in here!
Is not that exciting?
What?
Why are you excited about the monster pages?
They are super scary.
It is better that they are scary.
Do not you think they are cooler that way?
Really?
You have weird taste, old dude.
I am so envious.
I would love to be in this book, too.
You want to be a hero?
I do, too... but I have no athletic talent.
Well, good for you.
Your personality sucks, old dude.
Well, then...
Time to go patrolling.
I am heading off.
According to the guide,
this is around the time when the Class A hero, Golden Ball, visits his favorite bar.
See ya, kid.
Be careful on your patrol, old dude.
Sure.
Also, stop calling me old dude.
Learn how to talk to people.
Huh?
What was that, old dude?
Hurry up and go home, kid.
All my attacks were dodged, parried, and blocked.
He also used throws and counters against me by reading my moves.
He can deal twice the damage by using his opponents' strength against them.
The strikes to our joints and vital points were also brutal.
He also incapacitated physical functions.
Your average monster usually just let us all its strength loose in a rampage.
But he is different.
He has special techniques to break people.
Fist of Flowing Water, Crushed Rock
In other words, he knows how to take down heroes.
Charanko
You want to spar with a strong martial artist?
Yeah.
I am sorta interested now.
Got any connections,
uh... Champon?
It is Charanko!
Here.
I will even give you a banana.
Do not put that there!
Then just go see Master Bang.
He seems to like you, anyway.
Come on, now.
I cannot push around an old guy.
Hey, that is rude!
A normal person cannot fight a martial artist right off the bat, anyway.
First, you have to learn the basic forms...
Actually, before that, you have to build up stamina.
You can run up and down hundreds of steps...
Or start by wiping the dojo floors...
Guess I will leave if you do not have any connections.
H-Hold on a sec!
There was a mixed martial arts competition I happened to enter on a whim.
The ticket is...
Here you go.
Charanko Participant Ticket
It is all wrinkled.
I registered as a participant, but I plan to bail.
It still works as an entry ticket, though, so you can go watch the competition.
You will be able to see all kinds of styles.
Thanks.
Stare...
So you are going to drop out?
Yeah, I mean, I am pretty hurt.
Stare...
It says the prize money is three million yen.
Well, it is a huge tournament.
The champion gets three million in one day's pay.
Stare...
Just so you know, you cannot enter in my place.
Hey.
Are you listening to me?
Izakaya Kodoku
You must be the Class A hero, Golden Ball.
Huh?
Class A Rank 26 Golden Ball
I have some business with you.
Step outside for a bit.
At least let me enjoy a drink first.
Hey, what the hell?!
Jeez, what a waste.
Sure, wild guy.
There is a parking lot nearby.
Let us go there.
Every once in a while, I get punks who want to challenge a pro hero.
If you are picking a fight just because you are drunk, you should reconsider.
This is your chance to bail.
Shut up, you drunk.
I am
You bastard.
You are way too lax, hero hunter.
Did Tank-Top Master seriously lose to a punk like you?
Just so you know, I am pretty good at hunting, myself.
After I take you down, I am going to go have another drink!
He guessed the bullet's trajectory by reading my hand movements.
Then how about this?!
A ricochet?
Whoops.
Luckily for you, I missed your vital points, but what do you think of that?
Are not heroes amazing?
Luckily?
It is because you are so drunk that your aim is off.
You are going to lose because you could not finish me off with that one shot.
Unfortunately for you, I have got plenty of ammo left.
Shape-memory Golden Bullets!
Take this!
Killer Move: Golden Breakout!
He is dodging all the bullets with minimal movement...
This guy's insane!
But...
This is my final shot.
I am going to end this.
How did you like that?
Are not monsters amazing?
You are finished.
Die.
You were not at the bar,
so I thought you had forgotten about our plans.
Class A Rank 28 Spring Mustachio
The Class A hero, Spring Mustachio?
I am flattered that you have heard of me.
You must be the hero hunter I keep hearing about.
Ding, ding.
For your prize, I will crush you now, too.
His right leg's been injured.
That should slow down his footwork.
I see.
Thank you for the advice.
Does not swinging that thing in a cramped place like this put you at a disadvantage?
Oh, I am not so sure about... that!
I have you now!
Tomboy!
I have... got you!
Did you guys know that your trump cards are listed in the Hero Guide?
Opponents with weapons are easy once you get used to them.
Hey, do not get ahead of yourself.
You cannot keep doing this forever.
I am going to continue getting stronger.
Just try and take me out if you can!
Until you do, I will keep doing whatever the hell I want.
Hey, the Hero Association makes a lot of money, right?
Do not say things like that.
It costs a lot of money to keep the peace.
It is not like we are loaded.
Then why did you buy this for me?
And why do you always stop by our place?
To keep the peace, of course.
For an official from the Hero Association,
fooling around with you two is a necessary expense.
As someone who fights evil on the front lines, I need a way to restore my energy.
Letting loose, eh?
That means you are letting loose every single day.
Oh, I know.
Why do not I introduce you to Amai Mask next time?
What?
Really?
I am a huge fan of his!
If you give me a kiss on the cheek.
What?
I am not sure about that...
For real?
Really?
Let me meet him, too.
I will gladly kiss you on the cheek.
Letting loose, letting loose.
Life's so peaceful.
I felt great after defeating those Class A heroes...
Now I feel like I just stepped in shit.
Fighting evil on the front lines?
You make me sick.
Oh, hey.
I finally found you.
I have been looking for you.
Reinforcements?
Is he a hero, too?
I have never seen him before.
Must be some nameless bottom-ranker.
He is probably trying to catch me so he can climb up the ranks.
Well, I will strike first!
Huh?
What is the big idea?
Who the hell are you?
You trying to rob me?
Do not interfere with my shopping.
Excuse me, could I get this?
That will be 3,000 yen.
That is sorta expensive.
Not bad.
Master...
It bothers you that much...
Wait, it is not like that.
I have not decided to wear a wig for the rest of my life or anything.
Doctor Kuseno, it is me, Genos.
There is something I would like to discuss immediately.
Master Saitama is in a perilous state.
Those synthetic hair implants made of reinforced fiber...
You said you could implant them into living skin, correct?
Yes, that is right.
I believe I will need them after all.
So black is one of the color options?
If we decide to go forward with the operation, when will you be available?
The sooner the better?
Next Wednesday?
I see.
Yes, I will be accompanying him.
Understood.
Let us go with that day.
Thank you for all of your help.
Master Saitama!
Are you free next Wednesday?
Stop trying to stick reinforced fiber into my head without my permission.
I am going to enter a martial arts tournament wearing this.
As Charanko.
It is today?
Yup.
See you later.
I am going to go try out this martial arts thing.
Metal Bat
